items.title: Democratic Rep. Jasmine Crockett accused of ‘abusing her power’ at airport after she cut passengers in wheelchairs
items.snippet: Democratic Rep. Jasmine Crockett is being blasted on social media for jumping ahead of two passengers in wheelchairs while taking a flight out of Hartsfield-Jackson Atlanta International Airport over the weekend.

items.title: Lectric XP4 e-bikes open for preorder with up to $365 in free gear from $999, Bluetti Mother’s Day Sale takes up to 48% off units, more

items.title: Amazon's Zoox robotaxi unit issues software recall after recent Las Vegas crash
items.snippet: Amazon’s Zoox issued a software recall for 270 of its robotaxis after a crash in Las Vegas last month, the company said Tuesday.

items.title: Driver suddenly stops in middle of highway, causes multi-car crash, then leaves: video
items.snippet: A red van was caught on footage leaving the scene of a multi-vehicle car crash after stopping in the middle of the highway to turn into a missed exit.

items.title: Musk: What did he accomplish with DOGE?
items.snippet: The billionaire steps back from DOGE after slashing federal jobs and services

items.title: WATCH: Trump Says Gavin Newsom Can't Win for President After Bullet Train Failure, Fires
items.snippet:
President Donald Trump said Tuesday that California Governor Gavin Newsom (D) could never be elected president because of his failures on the costly, unfinished high-speed rail project and wildfires in his state.

items.title: Amazon India bets big on Tier-2, Tier-3 cities
items.snippet: Amazon's India head reveals focus on Tier-2 and Tier-3 cities, aggressive quick commerce expansion, and $15 billion investment commitment.
